description: Redis Dashboard for Prometheus Redis Exporter 1.x, it works with helm stable/redis-ha exporter.If you missing redis memory utilization, please modify "maxmemory" value in values.yaml

options.content: # IMPORTANT After each change please export this dashboard as JSON and update it in component-appcat repository

targets.expr:
1 - max without(prometheus_replica, organization) (
sum_over_time(slo:sli_error:ratio_rate5m{sloth_service=~"appcat-.+"}[$__range])
/ ignoring (sloth_window) count_over_time(slo:sli_error:ratio_rate5m{sloth_service=~"appcat-.+", service="VSHNRedis", namespace=~"$namespace", name=~"$name"}[$__range])
) >= 0

title: VSHN Redis
